org.smooks.container

Interface MementoCaretaker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMementoCaretaker

    public interface MementoCaretaker
    Manages VisitorMementos on behalf of Visitors.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void forget(Visitable visitable)
      Removes all VisitorMementos bound to the Visitable parameter.
      void remove(VisitorMemento visitorMemento)
      Removes the VisitorMemento having an ID equal to the VisitorMemento parameter's ID as returned by VisitorMemento.getId().
      void restore(VisitorMemento visitorMemento)
      Mutates a VisitorMemento to match the state of a saved VisitorMemento.
      void save(VisitorMemento visitorMemento)
      Stores a copy of a VisitorMemento.
      <T extends VisitorMemento>
      void      		 stash(T visitorMemento, Consumer<T> consumer)
      Invokes a Consumer with a restored VisitorMemento and then saves the VisitorMemento.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save(VisitorMemento visitorMemento)
        Stores a copy of a VisitorMemento. It is the client's responsibility to remove the saved VisitorMemento once it is no longer needed either by calling forget(Visitable) or remove(VisitorMemento).
        Parameters:
        visitorMemento - the VisitorMemento to copy and store. After saving, mutations to this VisitorMemento should not alter the saved copy.

      • restore

        void restore(VisitorMemento visitorMemento)
        Mutates a VisitorMemento to match the state of a saved VisitorMemento. The VisitorMemento parameter is restored from a saved VisitorMemento having an ID equal to its ID as returned by VisitorMemento.getId(). The VisitorMemento parameter remains unchanged if no such saved VisitorMemento exists.
        Parameters:
        visitorMemento - the VisitorMemento to restore

      • remove

        void remove(VisitorMemento visitorMemento)
        Removes the VisitorMemento having an ID equal to the VisitorMemento parameter's ID as returned by VisitorMemento.getId().
        Parameters:
        visitorMemento - the VisitorMemento to be removed

      • forget

        void forget(Visitable visitable)
        Removes all VisitorMementos bound to the Visitable parameter.
        Parameters:
        visitable - the visitable

      • stash

        <T extends VisitorMemento> void stash(T visitorMemento,
                                      Consumer<T> consumer)
        Invokes a Consumer with a restored VisitorMemento and then saves the VisitorMemento. This method offers a convenient way to aggregate and save data instead of writing: 
         mementoCaretaker.restore(visitorMemento);
 // add data to visitorMemento
 // ...
 mementoCaretaker.save(visitorMemento);
        Parameters:
        visitorMemento - the VisitorMemento to be restored
        consumer - the consumer acting on the restored VisitorMemento
        See Also:
        restore(VisitorMemento), save(VisitorMemento)
